com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core

Class Zookeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core.Zookeeper

  • public class Zookeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    The zookeeper keeps track of a cage of monkeys -- it is basically the middle manager between the solver and the monkeys. Cages are exchangeable. If a program is run with a fresh cage, each monkey will be re-evaluated. If a program is run with a cage that already contains some monkeys, we will reuse an old monkey if the parameter is the same. (See the chimp* methods in ChimpleProgram.)
    Author:
    BenL

    • Method Detail

      • resetTrackers

        public void resetTrackers()
        Resets the property "touched" on each monkey. Used to determine which monkeys to remove after regenerating one monkey and re-running the program (see killUntouched).

      • killUntouched

        public void killUntouched()
        Kills all monkeys that don't have the "touched" property set.
